item.title: Coach Development Workshops
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Two Swimming Coach CPD workshops have are scheduled to take place on Saturday 29th June. The workshops will focus on improving nutrition & psychology for your athletes. The nutrition workshop will cover: o  Fuel for the male and female swimmer o   Supplement Safety o   Race day good practice The psychology workshop will cover how to optimise performance […]

The post Coach Development Workshops appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Two Swimming Coach CPD workshops have are scheduled to take place on Saturday 29th June. The workshops will focus on improving nutrition & psychology for your athletes.

The nutrition workshop will cover:

o  Fuel for the male and female swimmer

o   Supplement Safety

o   Race day good practice

The psychology workshop will cover how to optimise performance under pressure: An introduction to mental skills and sport psychology to get the most from your athletes.

Both workshops will be delivered by Swim England Sports Science Specialists Andrew Shepherd and Stephen Eccles

Date: Saturday 29th June 2019

Venue: The Louisa Centre, Front St, Stanley DH9 0TE

Time: 10:30am to 3:00pm

Cost: £20 per candidate (includes refreshments and a light lunch).

Places can be booked at: Improving Nutrition & Psychology for your Athletes – Swimming Coach CPD Workshop

Post expires at 1:28pm on Sunday June 30th, 2019

The post Coach Development Workshops appeared first on Swim England North East.

Athletes from across the Swim England North East Region performed well at the FINA Diving World series third leg in Montreal, Canada from 26th to 28th April 2019. Congratulations to all involved in their achievements. Full results are available at clicking here.

item.title: Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Championships 2019
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Congratulations to City of Leeds Synchronised Swimming Team who achieved success at the  2019 Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Junior and Senior Championships at Harvey Hadden Sports Village in Nottingham from 27-28 April. City of Leeds athlete Greta Hampson claimed back-to-back gold medals at the 2019 Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Junior and Senior Championships, winning […]

The post Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Championships 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Congratulations to City of Leeds Synchronised Swimming Team who achieved success at the  2019 Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Junior and Senior Championships at Harvey Hadden Sports Village in Nottingham from 27-28 April.

City of Leeds athlete Greta Hampson claimed back-to-back gold medals at the 2019 Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Junior and Senior Championships, winning the Free Solo title.

City of Leeds duet Millie Costello and Daisy Rushton won a silver medal in the free duet.

City of Leeds A won the bronze medal in the free combination.

Full results are available by clicking here.

Well done to all involved.

The post Swim England National Synchronised Swimming Championships 2019 appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Information Talks for Parents, Swimmers and Coaches
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Two presentations have been scheduled to help support parents, swimmers and coaches by providing them with useful, up-to-date information and practical advice to help support athletes. These will both take place at the NER Swimming Championships 2019. The subject areas covered will be The Performance Swimming Pathway – Sunday 12th May Practical Nutritional Advice for […]

The post Information Talks for Parents, Swimmers and Coaches appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Two presentations have been scheduled to help support parents, swimmers and coaches by providing them with useful, up-to-date information and practical advice to help support athletes. These will both take place at the NER Swimming Championships 2019.

The subject areas covered will be

The Performance Swimming Pathway – Sunday 12th May

Practical Nutritional Advice for Swimmers – Saturday 25th May

Both presentations will take place between the morning and afternoon pool sessions at approx 1pm to 2pm in the Denison Suite (at the rear of the spectator area), Leeds Aquatics Centre.

Both sessions will be led by staff from the Swim England Talent Team.

There’s no need to book a place, just come along.

Post expires at 1:42pm on Sunday May 26th, 2019

The post Information Talks for Parents, Swimmers and Coaches appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: British Swimming Announces Team of Athletes for 2019 World Championships
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
British Swimming has announced the swimmers selected to compete at this summer’s FINA World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea. The team includes several athletes who have come through the performance pathway from clubs based in the North East Region including Max Litchfield (Doncaster), James Wilby (York), Aimee Willmott (Middlesbrough), Nick Pyle (Newcastle) and Georgia Coates […]

The post British Swimming Announces Team of Athletes for 2019 World Championships appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
British Swimming has announced the swimmers selected to compete at this summer’s FINA World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea.

The team includes several athletes who have come through the performance pathway from clubs based in the North East Region including Max Litchfield (Doncaster), James Wilby (York), Aimee Willmott (Middlesbrough), Nick Pyle (Newcastle) and Georgia Coates (Leeds).

The World Championships take place from 12th – 28th July.

The post British Swimming Announces Team of Athletes for 2019 World Championships appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: Swimming Coach Education Funding 2019-20
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
Funding from the Swim England North East Region is available for affiliated clubs to support them with their coaches completing a Swimming Coach (Level 2) qualification. The funding process is now open for applications. Details of the scheme are available at: Swimming Coach Education Funding Scheme 2019-20 An application form is available at: Swimming Coach Funding […]

The post Swimming Coach Education Funding 2019-20 appeared first on Swim England North East.
item.content:encoded:
Funding from the Swim England North East Region is available for affiliated clubs to support them with their coaches completing a Swimming Coach (Level 2) qualification.

The funding process is now open for applications.

Details of the scheme are available at: Swimming Coach Education Funding Scheme 2019-20

An application form is available at: Swimming Coach Funding Scheme 2019-20 Application Form

The post Swimming Coach Education Funding 2019-20 appeared first on Swim England North East.

item.title: British Swimming Championships 2019
item.dc:creator: David Parry
item.description:
There were many outstanding performances form athletes from across the Swim England North East Region at the British Swimming Championships held in Glasgow from the 16th to 21st April 2019. Full results from the Championships are available to view by clicking here. Well done to all athletes, coaches, support staff and volunteers involved.
